items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js application for fetching detailed information about Discord users through a simple API. Clone the repository, set up, and run locally to access extended user data, including username, discriminator, avatar, banner, user flags, Nitro type, and creation date.

Clone the repository, set up, and run locally to access extended user data, including username, discriminator, avatar, banner, user flags, Nitro type, and creation date.
